name: Pirate Captain
story: The player is the captain of The Black Pearl, a legendary pirate ship. The player's crew has just docked at Tortuga, a notorious pirate haven. Adventure and treasure await as the player explores the Caribbean during the Golden Age of Piracy.

shipwright.story: The player's ship needs repairs before they can set sail again. The player must find the shipwright and hire him to fix The Black Pearl.

Tortuga.name: Tortuga
Tortuga.description: A bustling pirate port filled with taverns, traders, and trouble.

Black Pearl.name: Black Pearl
Black Pearl.description: The player's ship, moored at the docks, ready for the next voyage.

blocked_exits.open sea: The Black Pearl is not seaworthy until it is repaired.

Captain's Cabin.name: Captain's Cabin
Captain's Cabin.description: The player's personal quarters on the ship, filled with maps and treasures.

Sleepy Mermaid.name: Sleepy Mermaid
Sleepy Mermaid.description: A rowdy inn filled with pirates and rumors of treasure.

Tortuga Market.name: Tortuga Market
Tortuga Market.description: A bustling market filled with merchants, pirates, and rare goods. The air is thick with the scent of spices and the sound of haggling.

Gibbs.name: Gibbs
Gibbs.description: The player's loyal first mate with a keen sense of duty.

Calypso.name: Calypso
Calypso.description: A bartender at the Sleepy Mermaid, known for her enchanting stories and elusive nature.

Shipwright.name: Shipwright
Shipwright.description: A burly shipwright who will repair the player's ship. He requires a ship repair ledger to begin the work, and a payment of 500 gold doubloons to complete the repairs.

Charming Marvin.name: Charming Marvin
Charming Marvin.description: A merchant who deals in common items necessary for life at sea. Unpleasant smell and unpleasant demeanor, but has what the player needs.

contingency_prompts: When the player first enters the Sleepy Mermaid, Calypso greets them.
Calypso never leaves the Sleepy Mermaid, so the player must find her there.
The shipwright can BEGIN work for a small deposit. To FINISH the repairs, he requires payment of 500 gold doubloons.
contingency_rules: If the player has met Calypso, set the var `calypso_met` to `true`.
If the shipwright agrees to start repairs on the Black Pearl, set `black_pearl_repairs_started` to true and remove the ship repair ledger from inventory.
Scene changes to 'british_docks' when `black_pearl_repairs_started` is true.
If black_pearl_repairs_started is true and calypso_met is true, advance to the next scene: 'british_docks'.

british_docks.story: The player needs gold to pay the shipwright. The British Docks hold a chest of gold doubloons, but it's heavily guarded territory. The player will need to use cunning and disguise to steal the treasure.

contingency_prompts: Allow the player to access the British Docks through creative in-world solutions, but not brute force.
The chest on the British Docks is too heavy for one person to carry.
British naval uniforms and forged documents might be useful for infiltrating the British Docks.
contingency_rules: Only when the player accesses the British Docks, set `british_docks_accessed` to true.
Only when the player steals the chest of gold doubloons, set `gold_stolen` to true and add '510 gold doubloons' to inventory.
When the player has returned to the Black Pearl and paid the shipwright, remove 500 gold doubloons from inventory, leaving 10 gold doubloons, and set shipright_paid to true.
As soon as `shipwright_paid` is true, the scene advances to 'calypsos_map'.

calypsos_map.story: With gold in hand, the player can pay the shipwright. But Calypso has something special for the player - a treasure map that will lead to even greater riches. The player must complete their business and claim the map.

contingency_prompts: Calypso will only give the treasure map to someone she trusts - someone who has proven themselves worthy.
contingency_rules: Only when the player receives the treasure map from Calypso, set `map_obtained` to true and add 'treasure map' to inventory.
When the player returns to the Black Pearl, with `map_obtained` true, the game ends successfully.

opening_prompt: You stand on the bustling docks of Tortuga, the salty air thick with the promise of adventure. Your ship, The Black Pearl, needs repairs before you can set sail. What will you do next?
contingency_rules: Never let Gibbs leave the player's side. He is always ready to assist and will follow the player wherever they go.
